char* b64dec ( const unsigned char *  data,
size_t *  len,
const char *  charset = NULL 
)

Decode a base64 encoded string into plaintext (returns a buffer).

Parameters:
data A c-style string to decode
len Reference to length of string (to be updated on return)
optional charset The charset to use.
Returns:
A decoded NULL-terminated c-style string (must be free()d later)

len Reference to length of string (to be updated on return)

size_t *  len,
const char *  charset = NULL

Encode a plaintext string into base64 (returns a buffer).

Parameters:
src A c-style string to encode
len Reference to length of string (to be updated on return)
optional charset The charset to use.
Returns:
An encoded NULL-terminated c-style string (must be free()d later)

const char *  charset = NULL

Base64 decode a string.

Parameters:

Returns:
A new, decoded string
